Articles.Content:
Since my account got deleted and i didn't really introduce myself the last time i thought this would be the best opportunity to do it.

My Forum name is Canopus, the second brightest star as seen from earth which is used as a navigation reference by many spacecrafts.

I play KSP since the days before there were Fuel lines and gimballed engines and i never got bored. Most of the Time i would do simple Flybys of the Mun to enjoy the view. My first actual landing was when i bought the Full version 0.16 with the 3 person Capsule (i don't like to send Kerbals alone) and it worked on the first try! My first rendezvous and docking was in 0.16 too using the incredible ORDA mod. I care very much for my Kerbals and every manned rocket i build has a fully tested abort system. Currently i'm building a Mun base.

Its nice to be back on the Forums!

PS: please forgive my horrible writing. English is not my first language.
